text: 21.25 Apo 15.29 Pen binɨb Juda mel Jisas nop gos lɨnepal okok kɨlop, mɨj tɨkyokɨl agɨnok, Binɨb kɨli tap yepɨs ogɨnap sɨbogɨnɨg, sab chag tap okok pakenɨgel, ma ñɨŋɨnɨmɨb agɨnok agɨlak. Kuŋam tɨg wukel kumek, nɨkɨm sek yenɨgab tek ma ñɨŋɨnɨmɨb agɨnok agɨlak. Kuŋam tɨkem, nɨkɨm amdek nep ñɨŋɨnɨmɨb agɨnok agɨlak. Sab chag tap okok nɨkɨm ak ma ñɨŋɨnɨmɨb agɨnok agɨlak. Bin si bɨ si ma gɨnɨmɨb agɨnok agɨlak.
